name: Best Kept Secret

config_properties.name: Best Kept Secret
config_properties.description: An indie music festival in Hilvarenbeek, Netherlands, featuring alternative, indie rock, and electronic music.

ai_profile:
**Best Kept Secret 2026: A Celebration of Eclectic Sounds and Diversity**

The 2026 edition of Best Kept Secret promises a rich tapestry of sound, bringing together 52 artists from across the globe. With a diverse lineup spanning genres like electronic, post-punk, hip-hop, alternative rock, indie folk, and even Afrobeat, the festival continues its tradition of showcasing an eclectic mix of established acts and emerging talent. Notable contributions come from musicians hailing from 16 different countries, with strong representation from the USA, the Netherlands, the UK, and Australia, as well as unique contributions from Ghana, South Africa, and Brazil. This global reach ensures a vibrant cultural exchange and an array of musical styles to suit every taste.

Diversity is a key hallmark of this year’s festival. The lineup features artists of various gender identities, with 22 male acts, 9 female acts, 9 mixed-gender groups, and representation from non-binary artists. Furthermore, 12 of the performers identify as people of color, adding important cultural and artistic perspectives to the event. This commitment to inclusivity reflects the festival’s dedication to amplifying voices from all walks of life and fostering a space where different identities and stories can thrive.

With an average rating of 7.2 from 76.9% of rated acts, the 2026 lineup has been positively received by critics and fans alike. The festival’s focus on curation is evident, with 98.1% of the acts boasting Spotify links, making it easy for attendees to explore and discover new favorites ahead of the event. Best Kept Secret 2026 is poised to be a celebration of musical innovation, cultural diversity, and the unifying power of live music.
